column4: hey guys! I'm having some diffculties to boot Ubuntu on my LG LW20 laptop. you think the "breezy" RC could perhaps work better on laptops? should I give it a shot?
the installation went fine, but during boot the systems hangs while loading hotplug PCI...
heh, yeah my patience ran out a couple of days ago though. debian was IMPOSSIBLE to even install on the machine.
won't hurt to give it a shot?
